data.description:
Play your favorite music files in VR using VROCK music player for GearVR!  Tap to bring up the menu, look and tap to operate. You can swipe up and down to change visualizers, and you can swipe left and right to change tracks!

VRock has awesome features!
-Enjoy your music with four different visualizers, ranging from psychedelic to sci-fi!  Fly through space as you listen to your tunes!
-Full file browser! Play music from /sdcard/Music, or anywhere else on your device!
-Plays all music files in the same folder on loop! Keep the party going!
-Control playback using the easy-to-use virtual menu, or by swiping your touchpad!
-Shuffle your tunes! Who knows what you'll experience next!
-Mono/Stereo switch for folks with diminished hearing in one ear.
-Kick back and relax; you can recenter your view in any orientation (Mystify visualizer only)

VRock supports the following music formats:
-.mp3
-.mod
-.it
-.mv
-.s3m

Like what you are reading? Download now, it's FREE!

changelog.change_log:
- No longer shows folders to which you don't have read access
- Folder buttons have a different highlight color than songs
- Volume and track control hud elements moved so they don't clip with geometry
- Fixed overlay rendering for Sound Valley visualizer
- Tweaked reflectivity and bloom
- Performance improvments
- Numerous bug fixes
- Warpspeed visualizer bugfix: Music Home button now hooked up.

- Added 2 new Sci-Fi visualizers!  "Red Alert" and "Warpspeed!"  Listen to your tunes in style while you cruise the universe!
- Many bug fixes, optimizations, and improvements!

- Fixed final context back button behavior
- Hide cursor when pressing back from a screen
